scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const distDir = path.join(__dirname, 'dist'); if (fs.existsSync(distDir)) { fs.rmSync(distDir, { recursive: true, force: true }); console.log('Dist directory deleted.'); } else { console.log('Dist directory does not exist.'); }"
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean && npm run build
